**2022-07-20 / @rsc, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons**

**Accepted**

- **all: add freebsd/riscv64 port** [#53466](https://golang.org/issue/53466)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **cmd/compile: require build systems to specify -importcfg** [#51225](https://golang.org/issue/51225)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **crypto/x509: surface ReasonCode inside x509.RevocationList entries** [#53573](https://golang.org/issue/53573)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net: add FlagRunning to the Flags of struct Interface, to exactly reflect the states of an interface or NIC** [#53482](https://golang.org/issue/53482)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **testing: add Elapsed() method to testing.B** [#43620](https://golang.org/issue/43620)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **testing: report GC/op when b.ReportAllocs is called** [#52466](https://golang.org/issue/52466)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **cmd/dist: cli based upgrades** [#53596](https://golang.org/issue/53596)
  - duplicate of #27700
- **cmd/go: support build customization with a build.go file** [#20177](https://golang.org/issue/20177)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **crypto: implement CMAC** [#52931](https://golang.org/issue/52931)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **go/doc/comment: support doc links to builtins** [#53633](https://golang.org/issue/53633)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **io: register close finalizers on Pipe** [#53362](https://golang.org/issue/53362)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **math/rand or crypto/rand: add random strings generators** [#53447](https://golang.org/issue/53447)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **strconv: add ParseFloatPrefix** [#53340](https://golang.org/issue/53340)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **testing: add magic //go:cover ignore comment** [#53271](https://golang.org/issue/53271)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **x/net/webdav: make webdav/internal/xml module public** [#53527](https://golang.org/issue/53527)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
